content: --कः, --ककारः {1} a crow (there being two {%Kas%} in the word काक). {2} the ruddy goose (there being two {%kas%} in the word कोक).

द्विक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Two-fold, forming a pair, consisting of two. {@--2@} Second. {@--3@} Happening the second time. {@--4@} Increased by two, two percent; द्विकं शतं वृद्धिः <ls>Ms. 8. 141-2</ls> See द्विक under द्वि also.
